comment: The maximum size of a finite simple graph with ` n ` vertices is ` ( ( ( n - 1 ) * n ) / 2 ) ` . See statement in section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 3 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 14-Nov-2020.)
